resources.string: Sorry, we are unable to process your device\'s camera photos.
Take a picture of the text you want to put onto a flashcard.
The text recognizer isn\'t ready yet. Make sure you have a good internet connection and sufficient storage space so it can properly initialize.
Unable to detect any text from your image. Click the + button to try again.
Use the {ion-android-add-circle} button below to create your first flashcard with image-based text recognition!
Are you sure you want to quit? All of your progress will be lost.
Select the text blocks you want to keep. You can edit this text later.
